text: Michael G. Burton is an astronomer who is director of the Armagh Observatory and Planetarium. He was previously director of teaching at the School of Physics, University of New South Wales. He is a member of the International Astronomical Union. Burton is a fellow of Astronomical Society of Australia (FASA), Australian Institute of Physics (FAIP), and the Royal Society of New South Wales (FRSN). == References == Category:Living people Category:University of New South Wales faculty Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Astronomers Category:Fellows of the Australian Institute of Physics Category:Fellows of the Royal Society of New South Wales
title: Michael G. Burton
